title: Bride walks in on groom sexually assaulting bridesmaid - but still marries him

A bride caught her groom sexually assaulting her bridesmaid just two days before the wedding - then married him anyway.

Daniel Carney admitted taking advantage of the woman, who was seen in CCTV footage unsteady in her feet during a party celebrated the upcoming nuptials.

The bridesmaid claims she blacked out at the celebrations and woke up in a men's changing room, with her bikini bottoms removed, at the venue in Pennsylvania, USA.

She says 28-year-old Carney, sexually assaulted her, with the attack only stopping when the bride-to-be walked into the room.

(Image: WNEP/ABC)

(Image: WTAP)

Police say a physical fight took place between the bride and groom-to-be, who went on to get married two days later.

Carney has been charged with involuntary deviate sexual intercourse of an unconscious person and indecent assault.

Officers investigating the sexual offence were given permission by the Monroe County District Attorney's Office to listen into telephone conversations between the accused and his victim.

(Image: WTAP)

Police say that Carney repeatedly told her he was sorry and admitted being at fault.

He is also said to have admitted to investigators that he "took advantage" of the woman.
description: Daniel Carney admitted taking advantage of the woman as the wedding party celebrated in Pennsylvania, USA
